Package controller

Class IndexMgr

java.lang.Object
controller.ObjectEntityController
controller.IndexMgr
public class IndexMgr
extends ObjectEntityController
Class that manages the list of indices for a particular course

  • Field Summary

    void addIndex​(java.lang.String indexNumber, int vacancy, java.lang.String courseCode, int academicUnits)
    Adds an index to the index list of a course Checks if a non-negative integer has been entered as the index number Also checks if the entered index number does not already exist
    void addLesson​(Index index)
    Adds a lesson to a given index The type of class, weeks and timings of each lesson are entered by the user If no lessons are added for the index, the index is removed

    • checkObjectExists

      public boolean checkObjectExists​(java.lang.String indexNumber)
      Checks if an index with a particular index number exists in the list of indices
      Specified by:
      checkObjectExists in class ObjectEntityController
      Parameters:
      indexNumber - index number that needs to be verified
      Returns:
      boolean value to indicate if the required index exists or not

    • addIndex

      public void addIndex​(java.lang.String indexNumber, int vacancy, java.lang.String courseCode, int academicUnits)
      Adds an index to the index list of a course Checks if a non-negative integer has been entered as the index number Also checks if the entered index number does not already exist
      Parameters:
      indexNumber - index number of the index to be added
      vacancy - number of vacancies of the index to be added
      courseCode - course code of the course to which new index needs to be added
      academicUnits - academic units of the course to which the index belongs to

    • addLesson

      public void addLesson​(Index index)
      Adds a lesson to a given index The type of class, weeks and timings of each lesson are entered by the user If no lessons are added for the index, the index is removed
      Parameters:
      index - object of type index to which new lesson needs to be added

    • checkAvailabilityIndex

      public void checkAvailabilityIndex​(java.lang.String indexNumber)
      Prints the number of vacancies left for a given index Checks if the index exists before printing
      Parameters:
      indexNumber - index number of the required index
